A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film was better than TFA and didn’t just feel like a remake of the original saga’s revenge of the sith so I really respect that about the movie. The senes with Rey and Luke were really well done and actually sequences were exciting. But aside from Luke and Rey\, the plot is dumb\, messy\, and all over the place\, they tried to fit too much in and some of it is just so pointless it makes the movie boring and just makes you want to get back to the story of Luke and Rey
